content: this pattern will you through the process of crocheting your very own cute woodland mushroom amigurumi we ll show you how to crochet the stem and mushroom cap and then we ll show you a few ways to customize the look of your mushroom with dots french knots and more **finished measurements** mushroom measures 5″ wide **gauge** 16 single_crochet and 18 row = 4 in getting the correct gauge is not crucial to the success of this pattern that said it is important to use a crochet hook that s 1-2 sizes smaller than normal so that you crochet a tight dense fabric
